description: Gets detailed information for an image. Images are specified with either an imageTag or imageDigest. When an image is pulled, the BatchGetImage API is called once to retrieve the image manifest.

parameters.name: repositoryName
parameters.description: The repository that contains the images to describe.

parameters.name: imageIds
parameters.description: A list of image ID references that correspond to images to describe. The format of the imageIds reference is imageTag=tag or imageDigest=digest. (dict) --- An object with identifying information for an image in an Amazon ECR repository. imageDigest (string) --- The sha256 digest of the image manifest. imageTag (string) --- The tag used for the image.

nested_params.name: imageDigest
nested_params.description: The sha256 digest of the image manifest.

nested_params.name: imageTag
nested_params.description: The tag used for the image.

parameters.name: acceptedMediaTypes
parameters.description: The accepted media types for the request. Valid values: application/vnd.docker.distribution.manifest.v1+json | application/vnd.docker.distribution.manifest.v2+json | application/vnd.oci.image.manifest.v1+json (string) ---

nested_items.name: images
nested_items.description: A list of image objects corresponding to the image references in the request.

nested_items.name: registryId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID associated with the registry containing the image.

nested_items.name: repositoryName
nested_items.description: The name of the repository associated with the image.

nested_items.name: imageDigest
nested_items.description: The sha256 digest of the image manifest.

nested_items.name: imageTag
nested_items.description: The tag used for the image.

nested_items.name: imageManifest
nested_items.description: The image manifest associated with the image.

nested_items.name: imageManifestMediaType
nested_items.description: The manifest media type of the image.

nested_items.name: failures
nested_items.description: Any failures associated with the call.

nested_items.name: imageDigest
nested_items.description: The sha256 digest of the image manifest.

nested_items.name: imageTag
nested_items.description: The tag used for the image.

nested_items.name: failureCode
nested_items.description: The code associated with the failure.
